mcode Reference Model Version 1.0.0
shr.core

Element DispenseRequest

Documentation:

Indicates the specific details for the dispense or medication supply part of a medication request (also known as a Medication Prescription or Medication Order). Note that this information is not always sent with the order. There may be in some settings (e.g. hospitals) institutional or system support for completing the dispense details in the pharmacy department.

Ancestors:
  • DispenseRequest
Used By:
  • MedicationRequest

    • Field Summary

      Properties Defined Constraints Value
      InitialFill

      Indicates the quantity or duration for the first dispense of the medication.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      InitialFill
      0..1
      DispenseInterval

      The minimum period of time that must occur between dispenses of the medication.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      DispenseInterval
      0..1
      ValidityPeriod

      This indicates the validity period of a prescription (stale dating the Prescription).
      DataType
      Cardinality
      ValidityPeriod
      0..1
      NumberOfRefillsAllowed

      The maximum number of times the dispense can be repeated. For medication dispense, this integer does NOT include the original order dispense. This means that if an order indicates dispense 30 tablets plus 3 repeats, then the order can be dispensed a total of 4 times and the patient can receive a total of 120 tablets.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      NumberOfRefillsAllowed
      0..1
      QuantityPerDispense

      The amount that is to be dispensed for one fill.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      QuantityPerDispense
      0..1
      SupplyDuration

      Identifies the period time over which the supplied product is expected to be used, or the length of time the dispense is expected to last.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      SupplyDuration
      0..1
      ExpectedPerformer

      Who this request is being addressed to.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Organization
      0..1
